com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base

Interface BaseWidget

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicLinkWidget, DynamicProgressWidget, DynamicScrollableWidget, DynamicStateSelectedWidget, DynamicStateWidget, DynamicTextWidget, DynamicWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicAppBarLayout, DynamicBottomNavigationView, DynamicButton, DynamicCardView, DynamicCheckBox, DynamicCheckedTextView, DynamicCollapsingToolbarLayout, DynamicEditText, DynamicExtendedFloatingActionButton, DynamicFloatingActionButton, DynamicFrameLayout, DynamicGridView, DynamicHeaderImageView, DynamicHueSeekBar, DynamicImageButton, DynamicImageView, DynamicLinearLayout, DynamicListView, DynamicNavigationView, DynamicNestedGridView, DynamicNestedListView, DynamicNestedScrollView, DynamicPopupBackground, DynamicProgressBar, DynamicRadioButton, DynamicRecyclerView, DynamicScrollView, DynamicSeekBar, DynamicSpinner, DynamicSwipeRefreshLayout, DynamicSwitchCompat, DynamicTabLayout, DynamicTextInputEditText, DynamicTextInputLayout, DynamicTextView, DynamicToolbar, DynamicViewPager

    public interface BaseWidget
    Interface to create base widget and to do the initialization work.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize()
      Initialize this widget by setting color type.
      void loadFromAttributes(AttributeSet attrs)
      Load values from the supplied attribute set.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromAttributes

        void loadFromAttributes(AttributeSet attrs)
        Load values from the supplied attribute set.
        Parameters:
        attrs - The supplied attribute set to load the values.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initialize this widget by setting color type. If it is background aware then, background color will also taken into account while setting the color filter.
        See Also:
        Theme.ColorType
